name: Christmas Crackers (1983 Edition)
overview: The 1983 Christmas Crackers is a compilation of 21 Christmas themed games. The 1983 compilation comprised Sleigh Lander, Christmas Simon, Anagrams, Ski Slope, Carol Quiz, Tic-Tac-Toe, Collect The Trees, Maze Pud, Snow Pud, Chimes, Christmas Word Search, Dodge Dad, Mover, Christmas Keyboard Tester, Blind-Man's Buff, Forest Run, Halves, Turkey Shoot, Crazy Santa, Christmas Snap, and Santa Skittle. Note that Micro User used the "Christmas Crackers" name again, for a different compilation released in 1986 and again in 1987.
